<!-- Tapatalk Banner head start -->
{vb:set tapatalkTempVarSiteUrl, {vb:url ''}}
<link href="{vb:raw tapatalkTempVarSiteUrl}/{vb:raw vboptions.tapatalk_directory}/smartbanner/appbanner.css" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" media="screen" />
<script type="text/javascript">
var app_ios_id = "{vb:raw vboptions.app_ios_id}";
var app_android_id = "{vb:raw vboptions.app_android_id}";
var app_kindle_url = "{vb:raw vboptions.app_kindle_url}";
var app_banner_message = "{vb:raw vboptions.app_banner_message}";
var app_forum_name = "{vb:raw vboptions.bbtitle}";
var tapatalkTempVarSiteUrl = "{vb:raw tapatalkTempVarSiteUrl}";
var tapatalkTempVar1 = tapatalkTempVarSiteUrl.substring(tapatalkTempVarSiteUrl.indexOf('://')+3);
var app_location_url = 'tapatalk://'+tapatalkTempVar1+'/?location=index';
var functionCallAfterWindowLoad = 0;
</script>
<script src="{vb:raw tapatalkTempVarSiteUrl}/{vb:raw vboptions.tapatalk_directory}/smartbanner/appbanner.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
<!-- Tapatalk Banner head end-->
<!-- Tapatalk Banner body start --> <script type="text/javascript">tapatalkDetect();</script> <!-- Tapatalk Banner body end -->

phrasetype.name: vBulletin Settings
phrasetype.phrase: Enter your BYO App ID from Google Play, to be used on Android device. E.g. "com.quoord.tapatalkpro.activity"
E.g. "Follow {your_forum_name} with {app_name} for [os_platform]". Do not change the [os_platform] tag as it is displayed dynamically based on user's device platform.
Enter your BYO product ID in Apple App Store, to be used on iOS device
Enter your BYO App URL from Amazon App Store, to be used on Kindle Fire device. E.g. "http://www.amazon.com/gp/mas/dl/android?p=com.quoord.tapatalkpro.activity"

Advanced Use Only. Change it only if you did rename the Tapatalk plugin directory. And the default value is 'mobiquo'. If you have installed Tapatalk plugin in different directory, you will also need to apply the same settings in Tapatalk Forum Owner Area at http://tapatalk.com/forum_owner.php
Allow non-registered users to access your forum via Tapatalk.
Optional. Choose the sub-forums you want to hide from Tapatalk.
